short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds muting, blocking and reporting buttons to tweets, linkedin posts and bluesky posts depending on the platform possibilities.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily clean up your timelines with mute/block/not interested buttons on Twitter, BlueSky and Linkedin.

A mute, a block and a "report as spam" button on every tweet on twitter and x.com.

A block button on every bluesky post on bsky.app

An unfollow(this does not remove the connection) and not interested button on every post on Linkedin.
